cause.description:
Due to recent unfortunate events Jack Bauer was captured by the dirty communist Chinese goverment.
So I plan to go to Shanghai myself this summer, along with anyone else who wants to come.
What you say? This is a genius idea? Yes I know it is!
1. jack bauer must be saved
2. the chinese must be stopped
3. jack bauer must be returned to the United States
cause.name: Save Jack Bauer
